label: Dark Energy Evolution Parameter w_a
note: v16.2 STERILE MODEL: w_a = 0.0 (Static Dark Energy). Observed DESI deviations are treated as local 4D perturbations; the global Sterile manifold requires wa = 0
mathematical_goal: Sterile Model constrains w_a = 0 for manifold stability
theoretical_significance: In v16.2 Sterile Model, dark energy does not evolve. The measured DESI w_a values represent local perturbations, not global manifold dynamics. Setting w_a = 0 ensures topological stasis.

geometry.fundamental_constant: b3 = 24 (third Betti number of TCS G2)
geometry.physical_interpretation: No moduli rolling in Sterile (locked) manifold
